name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, residents of Jingdezhen, Jiangxi reported that the local tap water was abnormal. Videos showed that residents covered the open faucet with tissues or masks, and after one or two minutes, the tissues were full of dirt. Officials: Apart from sensory abnormalities, there is no impact on human health.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 15, Jingdezhen, Jiangxi. A netizen posted a video saying that he was born in Leping County, Jingdezhen. There is a chemical factory near his hometown that discharges sewage and toxic gas every day. Whenever he turns on the tap, the water is always turbid, and the nearby villages are all cancer villages. At the same time, his family members are also suffering from cancer. His grandmother died of cancer, and his mother and uncle also got cancer. The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17 (released), Guangxi Dahua Rural Commercial Bank launched a renewal loan to help people who cannot afford social security to pay their social security, and allow borrowers to use their pension to repay the loan after retirement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As the agreed September 30 deadline for guaranteed handover approaches, there are only 20 to 30 people (including management personnel) on the Jianye Riverside Garden construction site, and the work is basically suspended. The project has been inspected by central and provincial leaders, and the Henan Provincial Investment Group is the lead in guaranteed handover. Owners have questioned, "Why is the regional urban renewal return fund not used for project construction as per the guaranteed handover agreement?" "Why did Zhongyuan Trust's 200 million yuan loan with the project as collateral not be used for other purposes instead of the supervision account?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Even photos of Tiananmen Square submitted by netizens are restricted from sharing on Douyin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 17, a man from mainland China took to the street wearing clothes with the flag of the Republic of China on them. He was photographed by netizens and uploaded to the TikTok platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A doctor shared the hospital's drug use situation after drug centralized procurement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 17, pagers used by Hezbollah members exploded simultaneously across Lebanon, killing at least nine people and injuring about 2,800. According to Sky News Arabic, Israel's Mossad was responsible for the massive attack on Hezbollah pagers. Before the devices fell into the hands of Hezbollah members, they were planted with explosives, placing PETN (pentaerythritol tetranitrate) explosives in the batteries of the devices, which were then detonated by raising the temperature of the batteries, causing the devices to explode. The substance burns at 180 degrees Celsius (356 degrees Fahrenheit).

Reuters analyzed images of the destroyed pagers and found that their format and stickers on the back were consistent with those produced by Golden Sun God, a Taiwanese pager manufacturer. According to Reuters, Hezbollah fighters used pagers to avoid Israel tracking their location.

Lebanese digital rights organization SME...
fullContent:
9月17日，真主党成员使用的传呼机在黎巴嫩全境同时爆炸，造成至少 9 人死亡，约 2,800 人受伤。据天空新闻阿拉伯语频道报道，以色列摩萨德对此次针对真主党传呼机的大规模袭击负责 。在这些设备落入真主党分子手中之前，他们在其中安置了爆炸物，将 PETN（四硝酸季戊四醇酯）炸药放入装置的电池中，然后通过提高电池温度来引爆电池，使装置爆炸。这种物质在 180 摄氏度（356 华氏度）时燃烧。

路透社分析了被毁坏的传呼机的图像，发现其格式和背面的贴纸与台湾传呼机制造商金太阳神生产的传呼机一致。据路透社报道，真主党战士之所以使用寻呼机，是为了避免以色列追踪他们的位置。

黎巴嫩数字权利组织 SMEX 告诉路透社，以色列可能利用了该设备的弱点使其爆炸，也可能在到达真主党之前拦截了这批设备，并进行了电子篡改或植入爆炸装置。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17 (Released) A foreign teacher on the Lingostar one-to-one tutoring platform told a student that Taiwan is an independent country and can never be China. The parent next to him reminded the foreign teacher that Taiwan belongs to China, and the two sides had a dispute. The foreign teacher then said, "Taiwan is Taiwan, screw China," and then the two sides ended the call.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 18, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A boy who was studying at a Japanese school in Shenzhen was attacked and injured on his way to school. Japan's Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretary Hiroshi Moriya said at a press conference: From the perspective of protecting Japanese citizens, the local government has been asked to prevent similar incidents from happening again and to share detailed consultation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, Japanese schoolchildren in Shenzhen were attacked on their way back to school. Currently, security has been upgraded at the entrance of the Shenzhen Japanese School, and no students were seen entering or leaving at noon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Agence France-Presse, The New York Times and other media outlets quoted officials from the United States, Lebanon and other countries as saying that these pagers were ordered by Hezbollah from a Taiwanese company. Taiwanese company Golden Apollo said on Wednesday that the pagers used in the explosion in Lebanon on Tuesday were not manufactured by it, but by another company that had obtained its brand license, BAC. In response to this, netizens said, "Taiwan participated in the terrorist attack, so you can understand it this way."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, Typhoon Bebejia passed through Kunshan, Jiangsu. A fence with the words "Rule of Law, Patriotism, and Dedication" written on it on Yingbin West Road was blown away by the wind.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the Shanghai Composite Index fell below 2,700 points, with more than 4,700 stocks falling, setting a new low since February 6.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 15 report, Arxan City, Inner Mongolia. A 46-year-old teacher was stabbed 4 times, met the murderer again 50 meters away, fought back with a brick, and was sentenced to 10 years in prison. The court: I do not support legitimate defense. Netizens replied "Real version of Kunshan Long Ge" "Gentleman's revenge, 50 meters is too late"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17, Handan, Hebei. Hongwen Middle School announced at the Mid-Autumn Festival Gala that girls can keep their hair long, but they must wear it in a ponytail. The students at the scene cheered. Netizens responded, "This cheer is like the girls in the past hearing that they no longer need to bind their feet." "I am in tears. The children are so sad because they are so happy about such a simple thing."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Sima Nan went to the Tang Dynasty Never Sleeps City in Xi'an to participate in the Weibo Grand Tang Night Banquet event. It is reported that the event was sponsored by Xifeng Liquor. In response, many netizens said in the Xifeng Liquor live broadcast room and comment area that they would never drink Xifeng Liquor again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, on a train heading to Shanghai South Railway Station, a man sparked anger among passengers just because he mentioned a few good things about the United States during a chat. One of the passengers cursed the man as a beast and asked, "How could the Chinese raise such a beast?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. House of Representatives passed the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office Accreditation Act earlier, which may affect the operation of the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in the U.S. On September 17, Lee Ka-chiu said: If the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in the U.S. is closed, it will be American companies that will suffer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 2nd Anniversary

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 13, Taoyuan, Taiwan. A woman was reported online for scolding Taiwan for being backward because the bus did not have air conditioning on. "This is China from beginning to end." The woman also said "20 years behind Hong Kong" when getting off the bus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman said that her son was taken away by Moscow police for no reason, and the police demanded 10,000 rubles to release him. The woman said, "Business is already bad now, and these police are blackmailing us Chinese every day." Netizens replied, "Didn't they say long live the friendship between China and Russia?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens expressed support for the attackers at the Shenzhen Japanese school

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, Qiushi, the official publication of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, published an article praising the people's congress system as "a great creation in the history of human political systems", but forgot to close the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens said that this is the fastest way to identify the "1450 cyber army" on social platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 18, Ulanhot, Inner Mongolia. A woman said that she posted a job advertisement on the window of a store, but was told by the Urban Management that she violated the regulations and had to bring her ID card to accept the fine. The woman cried and said, "I didn't receive any notice that you can't post on the window, what's the point of doing this?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the media reported that Zhang Xianzhong voluntarily surrendered himself and accepted disciplinary review and supervisory investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted on a social platform that "If Kursk is still occupied by Ukraine in a month, I will commit suicide." This statement has caused a lot of discussion. On September 18, someone found that the netizen had cancelled his account by himself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Red Star News: Recently, some netizens reported that Xinqiao Middle School in Zizhong County, Sichuan, as a boarding school, was preparing to include all evening self-study classes from Monday to Thursday into after-school extended service, and the after-school extended service fee was calculated at 40 yuan per class. After receiving the report, the local education and sports department responded publicly, saying that the situation reported by netizens was basically true and that the school had been ordered to correct the mistake in a timely manner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Meta announced that it would ban Russian official media such as Russia Today from using its application platform. On September 17, the Russian Satellite News Agency reported that Chinese experts believed that Russian media were sanctioned only because they spoke with facts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17, Hangzhou Xixing Bridge. A young man sat on the bridge guardrail and shouted in agitation, "Rich people are withholding wages."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Chinese People's Liberation Army will participate in Brazil's annual military exercise, Operation Formosa, for the first time. The US military will also join. However, many netizens on social platforms recently posted that China won a great victory. The US Navy SEALs "killed 47 dogs, injured 7, and escaped 19, while the Chinese special forces only lost 4 robot dogs."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. The man said that he sold his house in his hometown to buy a house in Hangzhou, but the house was seized by the court because he stopped paying the mortgage. Not only did he lose the down payment for the mortgage in the past few years, he also lost his home and owed the bank hundreds of thousands of yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported on the Internet that the state-owned enterprise China Railway Construction Investment Group issued a notice: the issuance of qualification certificate allowances will be suspended; the monthly pre-payment performance salary of the heads and deputy heads of various departments and the team members of the affiliated units will be paid at 50%;

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17 (Released), Zhengzhou, Henan. A video of a police car on fire caused ridicule among netizens. Netizens replied, "No one survived" and "After watching this video, I suddenly want to have a drink."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 15th was the 70th anniversary of the founding of the National People's Congress. People's Daily Online released a video titled "I am a representative from the people", which triggered a lot of ridicule from netizens. Netizens responded with "We are cattle and horses, not the people" and "I got irritated and was disgusted all day. I have blocked you."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, blogger "Xiao Zan" went to a job market in Guangzhou and interviewed several people who were looking for work. They all said that it is difficult to find a job now. "It's not that we don't want to work, it's that there is nothing to do."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, according to the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission, Du Yubo, former deputy secretary of the Party Committee and deputy minister of the Ministry of Education, is suspected of serious violations of discipline and laws, and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and supervision investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 15, Shenyang, Liaoning. The man said that he spent 400,000 yuan through a consulting company and was assigned to work in the Shenyang Tobacco Monopoly Bureau, but after waiting for five months, he still didn't get the job. So he contacted the consulting company and signed a refund agreement, but the other party still refused. Refund. The man said that the 400,000 yuan was borrowed from various sources.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17, Vietnam. Chinese company Lihao Furniture failed to pay full wages, sparking a strike by workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 18, Changde, Hunan. The project of Country Garden Qiaochutang was left unfinished, and the owner was forced to jump off the building to defend his rights.
